title: Trooping the colour: a famous British ceremony
creator_credit: Anvil Films and British Information Services
brief_description: An authentic description of one of Britain’s most colourful ceremonies. Includes footage of Queen Elizabeth II, Duke of Edinburgh and Duke of Gloucester.
